Package com.mlt.db

Class Criteria

java.lang.Object
com.mlt.db.Criteria
public class Criteria
extends java.lang.Object
A criteria used to filter collections of documents, either in memory or by the underlying database. Accepted condition operators are:
  • "EQ", "GT", "GE", "LT", "LE", "NE"
  • "STARTS WITH", "CONTAINS", "ENDS WITH"
  • "IN", "NOT IN"
  • "IS NULL", "IS NOT NULL"
  • "BETWEEN", "NOT BETWEEN"
